staxel.village.dialogue.intro.Oscar.line: What have we here? Another troublemaker?
^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;'s the name. I'll be keeping an eye on you.
Oh, and stay off the grass! Keep the mud to the farm!
Ah. You must be the youngster who rebuilt my old home.
I'm somewhat impressed, though it could certainly be a little...tidier.
Oh, and please try to keep the mud out of the village.
It took me a full hour to clean my way home from the landing.
